Element.name: Operation
Element.Description: An Operation is a new kind of components, which can be placed outside of pages and linked to other operations, or to view components defined inside pages.

PropertyCategory.name: General
PropertyCategory.Property: If checked, the operation is executed when the ancestor Site View is accessed.

If checked, a flow will appear in the corresponding landmark menu that will activate the operation chain. If the operation or the operation chain has no outgoing flow, the final target page is the last visited page.
If checked, the access to the operation is permitted only to users belonging to a group entitled to access the operation.
If checked, all the flows whose navigation can activate the operation are implemented using the secure HTTP protocol, instead of the HTTP protocol.

PropertyCategory.name: Appearance
PropertyCategory.Property: A distinctive icon displayed in the diagram and in the outline.
If checked, all parts belonging to the view component will be displayed.
